name: Scopophobia - mobile
description:
in this game you play a kid who thinks everything is looking at them everywhere he goes. they feel like they are losing there mind. they feel like they are being chased everywhere they go.

this game has no dialog, no music, no sound effects. just pure game. there is a pc  version of the game on itch.io as well: scopophobia - windows and linux by Whywhyw123 (itch.io). so if you want your progress to be saved just play the pc version.
